This contract is only used to hold the staked LP tokens with a cooldown period on withdrawing acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

params.amount: the amount of tokens to send
params.to: the address to send the tokens to

params.amount: the amount of LP tokens to stake

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

params.amount: the amount of LP tokens to unstake

params.cooldown: the cooldown period for withdrawing LP tokens
params.epoch: the epoch the token is eligible for staking
params.stakeLimit: the maximum amount of LP tokens that can be staked
params.token: the LP token to update stake parameters for

params.amount: the amount of LP tokens to withdraw

renounceOwnership().notice: Prevents the owner from renouncing ownership, must be transferred in 2 steps

rescueTokens(address,address,uint256).notice: owner can rescue tokens that were accidentally sent to the contract

stake(address,uint104).notice: users can stake LP tokens to earn shards toward airdrop

stakeParametersByToken(address).notice: tracks stake parameters for each LP token, indexed by LP token address

stakes(address,address).notice: tracks all stakes, indexed by user and LP token

unstake(address,uint104).notice: users can unstake LP tokens to initiate the cooldown period. They will not be able to withdraw until the cooldown period has passed and do not earn rewards during this period.

updateStakeParameters(address,uint8,uint.notice: owner can add/update stake parameters for a given LP token

withdraw(address,uint104).notice: users can withdraw LP tokens after the cooldown period has passed
